head.title: Ackify — Proof of Read & GDPR Compliance Software

meta.name: description
meta.content: Solution de preuve de lecture pour conformité RGPD. Accusé de lecture open source et auto-hébergé. Essayez Ackify aujourd'hui !

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: proof of read, GDPR compliance, accusé de lecture, conformité RGPD, employee policy acknowledgment, internal compliance, self-hosted compliance, document acknowledgment, open source, Go, Docker
